participant_1.background:
I make time for my favorite hobbies, which include hiking and reading.
I do my best to be a good parent, but it's not always easy.
My rock collection is my favorite thing in the world.
I have a soccer ball in my baby's nursery.
i am from georgia.

participant_2.background:
My hobbies include coloring my hair bright colors and trying new coffee shops with my husband.
i work on a farm.
I found a geocache while riding my bike the other day.
I drive a car that is both reliable and fuel-efficient, so I can get to my business and music lessons on time.
I moved to the mountains so my dogs could have more space to run and play.

content.text: Hi, I'm from Georgia. What about you?
Hi there! I recently moved to the mountains so my dogs could have more space to run and play. How do you like Georgia?
It's beautiful! I love hiking and reading, so I get to enjoy nature a lot.
That sounds lovely! I love to go hiking too. I recently found a geocache while riding my bike.
That's awesome! I've never found a geocache before.
It was so exciting! I've been looking for more since then.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to try new coffee shops with my husband. We've been to a few great ones in the mountains.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've been meaning to try some new coffee shops too.
You should! It's a great way to explore a new place.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! Have you ever been to a music festival?
No, I haven't. I've always wanted to go to one, though.
They're so much fun! I went to one last year and it was amazing.
That sounds awesome! I'll have to look into going to one soon.
You definitely should! It's a great way to see some of your favorite bands and meet new people.
